alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 5:42PM CDT until April 02 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cooke County in north central Texas... Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 542 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Kiowa, or near Whitesboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Gainesville, Whitesboro, Denison, Van Alstyne, Howe, Pottsboro, Collinsville, Gunter, Bells, Tom Bean, Callisburg, Knollwood, Dorchester, Lake Kiowa, Lake Texoma, Southmayd, Tioga, Road Runner and Valley View. This includes Interstate 35 near mile marker 487. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
